LanguageData.MessagePawnRegressed: {0} has been regressed! All brain injuries got healed, but they will need a lot of help and attention to regain their lost memories and mental age!
LanguageData.LetterDiaperRash: {0} is suffering from a {1}, as a result of wearing a diaper too long. {PAWN_pronoun} will need some cream and baby powder.
